page.title: 15SCHOOLS IN 1985
page.content: Schools in 1985 _______ _______ Most schools in 1985 have mixed pupils some have only one sex in schools. There is the nursery for when you're just a toddler. There is the Primary middle and high schools. School starts and finishes at 9.00am till 3.00pm. In your Primary they teach you to read and write and add up etc. You learn these's things so you can go for a job. Whilst in school you have two breaks, one for 20 minutes in the middle of the morning and one is for your dinner hour. If you do a certain subject they have trips away for these lessons. Some schools have sport days between house teams at the end term. They give trophy's to the winning house's.
